name: split
summary: Divide large OSM files into smaller parts
description:
The split command divides large OSM files into smaller tiles. Supports:

- Grid-based splitting (e.g., 2x2, 4x4)
- Custom bounding boxes from file
- Splitting into N equal parts

Useful for parallel processing or working with large datasets.

options.--bbox-file: File with bounding boxes (JSON or CSV)
options.--count: Split into N roughly equal parts

output:
Multiple output files:
- One file per tile/region
- Named with prefix and grid position
- Complete ways included in each tile
